gui.cas.title: Create-A-Sim
gui.cas.gender.subject: Subject Pronoun
gui.cas.gender.possessive.tooltip: Ex: 'At least I think it was *theirs*'
gui.cas.gender.reflexive.tooltip: Ex: 'They threw the frisbee to themself.'
item.sims.spawn_wand.tooltip: Create a sim companion with this wand!
item.sims.spawn_wand.tooltip_advanced.1: Disclaimer: One sim companion per customer.
item.sims.spawn_wand.tooltip_advanced.2: Sim is not guaranteed to be your companion.
item.sims.spawn_wand.tooltip_advanced.4: Not available in all biomes. See store for details.
